        throws ph.com.globelabs.api.exception.GlobeApiException
        Parameters:
        subscriberNumber - The ten digit subscriber number with format 9xxxxxxxxx. Subscriber number and access token must match.

        Charges a subscriber who has already completed the authorization process.
        Parameters:
        amount - How much will be charged to the subscriber.
        referenceCode - Unique reference code to identify the transaction.

        See ChargeUserResponse
